disobedience.question: Did I use my words to ridicule or disrespect the Church?
disobedience.description: Mocking the church shows contempt for Christ's established institution on earth, disrespects the Body of Christ, and undermines the Church's divine authority as guided by the Holy Spirit.

envy.question: Have I felt envious towards others' successes and secretly wished they would lose their advantages?
envy.description: Envy leads us to have discontent for another's possessions so we won't feel the pain of comparison or perceived lack in our own lives.

envy.question: Have I resented others' successes and secretly hoped they would lose their advantages?
envy.description: Envy leads us to have discontent for another's possessions so we won't feel the pain of comparison or perceived lack in our own lives.

incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control and speak to others with vulgar language, thereby violating their dignity through my words?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control and speak to others with vulgarity, thus showing a lack of respect for their dignity through my words?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: in conversations with friends , family , or colleagues
incontinence.question: Did you lack self-control and use language that was degrading to others in conversations with friends, family, or colleagues?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what is reasonable
gluttony.question: Did you overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what is reasonable, demonstrating an excessive attachment to worldly pleasures and neglecting the virtue of temperance?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
gluttony.question: Have I overindulged in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, demonstrating an excessive attachment to worldly pleasures that rejects the call to temperance?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking on any occasion when it was contrary to what would be considered reasonable by God
to what would be considered reasonable by God
gluttony.question: Did I overindulge in eating or drinking on any occasion when it was contrary to what would be considered reasonable by God?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: over my financial obligations or family needs
prodigality.question: Have I prioritized excessive and wasteful entertainment expenses over my financial obligations or family needs, recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to me?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: in activities that jeopardize my financial stability , prioritizing leisure over family needs and responsibilities
prodigality.question: Have I excessively indulged in activities that jeopardize my financial stability, prioritizing leisure over family needs and responsibilities?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: in discussing others ' faults or private affairs through conversations at social gatherings , community events , or online forums
through conversations at social gatherings , community events , or online forums
at social gatherings , community events , or online forums
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in discussing others' faults or private affairs through conversations at social gatherings, community events, or online forums, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: through conversations or discussions with acquaintances or friends
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in sharing others' private affairs, even if what was shared was true, through conversations or discussions with acquaintances or friends?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: in sharing others ' personal stories or issues
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in sharing others' personal stories or issues, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: in unnecessary work - related activities on a Sunday
impiety.question: Did I indulge in unnecessary work-related activities on a Sunday, contrary to its sacred character?
impiety.description: It's irreverent to work on a Sunday as it's a holy day of rest, worship, and a day of protest against the servitude of work and the worship of money (CCC).
